title: Mandy Mericle
description: Software Engineer, Web Designer, Full Stack Developer. I help people create content that looks great and conveys meaning. I am currently available for freelance work, reach out via the content page or through one of the links below and lets get started on your next big project.

projects.title: Crime Mapper
projects.description: Dashboard that tracks crime across the Chicago area. Includes map and graph visualizations based on time, location, and other statistics.

projects.title: GigBook
projects.description: Hiring platform that connects Musicians to Gigs. Includes an interface for searching for musicians and a negotiation system for managing pay, location, and duration of the gig.

projects.title: Train Tracker
projects.description: Tracks CTA trains. Displays information about location, arrival times, and delays for each train in the CTA system.
